name: @geode/opengeodeweb-front

scripts.release:major: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:beta: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i prerelease --preid $(npm whoami) ) && npm publish --tag rc

description: OpenSource Vue/Vuetify framework for web applications
author: @geode
